ModMetaData.name: Camping Stuff
ModMetaData.author: Nandonalt
ModMetaData.description: v0.2.1 Camping Stuff Mod By Nandonalt: Adds Deployable Tents(Normal, Medium and Big), Sleeping Bags, Portable Stoves and the Butchering Spot. Version 2.0 enables you to make tents from any textile and adds two new sizes to tents: medium and big.
